title: Part-time Marketing Associate
job_overview:
Pay: PHP 17,000 per month
Timings: 12AM to 4AM Manila time (night shift), Monday to Friday

Responsibilities:
- Editing and creating short-form video content (e.g., Reels)
- Managing and updating CRM systems
- Sourcing and qualifying leads
- Conducting outbound cold calls and outreach on platforms like LinkedIn and Instagram
- Advising on optimal sales and marketing channels to pursue

Requirements:
- 2–4 years of experience in sales, cold calling, or lead generation
- Hands-on experience with CRM system management
- Strong graphic design skills (especially for social media content)
